events.message: I received the wrong size for my recent order and would like to request a refund. The item doesn't fit at all.
The customer's request has been identified as a refund issue due to receiving an incorrect size.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect sized item.
Hello! I'm Sarah, and I'll assist you with your refund request regarding the wrong size you received.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process the refund faster?
Sure, the order number is 4587321. I’ve attached a photo showing the wrong size label on the garment.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and send you a prepaid return label shortly.
I appreciate the quick response and the refund offer. I’ll return the item once I get the label.
The refund has been processed and the return shipment label sent to your email. Please let us know if you need any further help.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and that the return process went smoothly. We’re here if you need anything else.
Since there have been no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support!
Please take a moment to fill out our customer satisfaction survey regarding your recent refund experience.
